meanings.definition: A genus of bacteria that are typically found in the intestines of humans and other animals.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the sarcinae under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The sarcinae in the gut play a vital role in digestion.
meanings.sent3: The sarcastic sarcinae in the intestines always have a witty comment.
meanings.sent4: The sarcinae in the stomach formed a perfect cube, like tiny building blocks.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a model of sarcinae to explain bacterial structures to the students.

meanings.definition: A group of bacteria that are arranged in a cubical packet.
meanings.sent1: The sarcinae were neatly stacked together in a cube shape.
meanings.sent2: The cubical arrangement of sarcinae made them easy to identify.
meanings.sent3: The sarcinae in the petri dish decided to have a cube-building competition.
meanings.sent4: The sarcinae formed a perfect cube, resembling a tiny bacterial city.
meanings.sent5: The cube-shaped sarcinae looked like microscopic building blocks under the lens.
